item.title: UKRI Net-Zero Digital Research Infrastructure (DRI) Scoping Project
item.description: Initial Project Aim Our initial aim was to provide a clear roadmap to deliver carbon neutral digital research infrastructure (DRI) by 2040 or earlier.

item.title: C3S_34e - The Link between the CDS Toolbox and the ESGF Compute Nodes
item.description: Funder: Copernicus (C3S) Dates: 2020-2021 Summary: Improvement on the WPS link for C3S to access climate simulations. Aim: This project worked to build on the current WPS (Web Processing Service) framework in use by C3S to access global and regional climate simulations, which are curated and served by the Earth System Grid Federation (ESGF).

item.title: C3S_434 - CDS Interface to Climate-ADAPT
item.description: Funder: Copernicus (C3S) Dates: 2020-2021 Summary: Automated the provision of climate datasets from the Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S) Climate Data Store to Climate-ADAPT portal

item.title: CDS Zone 20-21
item.description: Funder: UKSA Dates: 2020-2021 Aim: The UK Climate Data from Space zone (CDS zone) is a dedicated computing area comprising 700TB storage and 200 processing cores on the JASMIN infrastructure to support UK ECV processing for the Copernicus Climate Change Service.

item.title: Met Office - Support for Ensembles
item.description: Funder: Met Office Dates: 2020-2021 Aim: Met Office interacts with large climate data archives, as scientific data provider and end-user. This funding supports the services to ingest, manage and deliver large climate multi-model ensembles such as CMIP6.

item.title: JASMIN support to JNCC
item.description: Funder: JNCC Dates: 2020-2021 Aim: Support Defra-JNCC with use of JASMIN for production of Sentinel Analysis Ready Data, and provision of access to users.

item.title: ESA Digital Twin Earth Precursor
item.description: Funder: ESA Dates: 2020-2021 Aim: Project led by TVUK, with NCEO, to develop a climate focused proof of concept, bringing models, data, AI and ICT together as a precursor to an ambitious European Digital Twin Earth activity.

item.title: UKCP18 Services 20-21
item.description: Funder: Met Office/Defra Date: 2020-2021 Aim: To provide data services to support access to the next generation of climate projections for the UK (2018).

item.title: C3S Oceans Data Archival

item.title: CCI Knowledge Exchange
item.description: Funder: ESA Dates: 2019-2022 Summary: Provide central access to ESA Climate Change Initiative Data Products and information Aim: Provide central access to ESA Climate Change Initiative Data Products and information

item.title: IS-ENES3 - Infrastructure for the European Network for Earth System Modelling (2019 - 2022)
item.description: Funder: European Commission Dates: 2020-2022 Summary: IS-ENES3 is the third phase of the distributed e-infrastructure of the European Network for Earth System Modelling (ENES).

item.title: C3S_34f - Maintenance of the dedicated C3S ESGF infrastructure for CMIP Global Climate Models
item.description: Funder: Copernicus (C3S) Dates: 2019-2021 Summary: Infrastructure and data that were supplied to C3S under a previous contract (C3S_34a Lot1) continue to be provided to support continuing work on other projects.

item.title: C3S_34g - Extension of the CDS Global Climate Model datasets to CMIP6 simulations
item.description: Funder: Copernicus (C3S) Dates: 2020-2021 Summary: Following on from C3S_34a Lot 1 which provided CMIP5 data via an extended and dedicated Earth System Grid Federation (ESGF) subsystem consisting of three partner sites, CEDA (UK), DKRZ (Germany) and IPSL (France), this project will deliver CMIP6 data through this same channel

item.title: CLIPC
item.description: Funder: EC Dates: 2013-2016 Aim: Climate Information Platform for Copernicus: provide access to climate information of direct relevance to a wide variety of users, from scientists to policy makers and private sector decision makers.

item.title: CCI Open Data Portal
item.description: Funder: ESA Dates: 2015-2018 Aim: Provide central access to ESA Climate Change Initiative Data Products and information CEDA role: Central archive, data access services and metadata

item.title: EUSTACE
item.description: Funder: European Commission Dates: 2015-2018 Aim: Derivation of surface air temperature consistently across all surfaces of Earth from land and lakes to ocean and ice

item.title: BACI
item.description: Funder: European Commission Dates: 2015-2018 Aim: The integration of ground and space observations leads to a series of new downstream products (biodiversity indicators) that can be directly interpreted by the user community.

item.title: FIDUCEO
item.description: Funder: European Commission Dates: 2015-2019 Aim: The FIDUCEO project will build nine new climate datasets from Earth Observation using a rigorous treatment of uncertainty, informed from the discipline of metrology (measurement science).

item.title: C3S311a Lot 2 (in-situ obs for Copernicus)
item.description: Funder: Copernicus (C3S) Dates: 2017-2020 Aim: provide a step change in access to, and quality of, global long-term land and surface-ocean Essential Climate Variable (ECV) records for use by Copernicus.

item.title: PRIMAVERA
item.description: Funder: European Commission Dates: 2015 - 2019 Aim: To develop a new generation of global high-resolution climate models CEDA role: data archival and JASMIN infrastructure resource provider

item.title: UKSA Copernicus Data Support
item.description: Funder: UKSA Dates: 2018 - 2019 (with possible extension into future years) Aim: Acquire and archive Copernicus Sentinel data from all satellites (priority focus on UK, but most global)

item.title: UKCP18 Services
item.description: Funder: Met Office/Defra Dates: 2018 - 2019 Aim: To provide data services to support access to the next generation of climate projections for the UK (2018).

item.title: UKCP09 User Interface
item.description: Funder: Environment Agency Dates: 2018 - 2019 Aim: Provide access to the UK Climate Projections (2009) via a web-interface and web processing service.

item.title: MOHC Data Pipeline
item.description: Funder: BEIS (via Met Office) Dates: 2018 - 2021 Aim: Supporting CMIP climate model data movement from the Met Office to the CEDA archive and ESGF.

item.title: IPCC DDC
item.description: Funder: BEIS Dates: 2018- 2020 (may be extended) Aim: Provide support and upgraded services to the IPCC Designated Data Centre

item.title: ESA DAP support for UKSA
item.description: Funder: UK Space Agency Dates: 2018 - 2019 Aim: Represent UKSA in LTDP Working Group and PV2018 Conference Organisation CEDA role: Point of contact for UK engagement in LTDP WG, participate in meetings.

item.title: Pest Risk Modelling in Africa (PRISE)
item.description: Funder: UKSA IPP programme Dates: 2016 - 2021 Aim: PRISE will improve the livelihoods of smallholder farmers by reducing crop losses caused by pests across six sub-Saharan African countries.

item.title: CDS Zone

item.title: Sentinel Data Relay Hub
item.description: Funder: European Space Agency Dates: 2015 - 2018 Aim: Operate data relay hub for ESA Sentinel Ground Segment CEDA role: Install and operate relay hub system to pull data from ESA Hub to the CEDA Archive
